## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` - New feature
- [ ] `fix` - Bug fix

## Testing
<!-- How was this tested? -->
- [ ] Unit/smoke tests pass (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] CLI e2e smoke tests pass (`go test -tags=clie2e -v ./e2e/... -run "Help|Params|MissingArgs"`) (if applicable)

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
